oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-08-27 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 27, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer), guest performers Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Vaden, Jimmie Selph, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1090th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Faron Young; Archie Campbell; Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper; Tommy Vaden; Jimmie Selph; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- There's Not Any Like You Left (Faron Young) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper -- Heartbreak Street (Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Tommy Vaden and Jimmie Selph -- Mississippi Sawyer (Tommy Vaden fiddle, Jimmie Selph calls) -- Grant Turner introduces Faron Young -- May The Good Lord Bless And Keep You (Faron Young) -- Faron Young introduces Chet Atkins -- Django's Castle (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States.
